Bingo Card Book Recommendations

Bingo Card All Books

Urban Fantasy

Bingo Square [14]

A subgenre of fantasy in which the narrative uses supernatural elements in a 19th-century to 21st-century urban society. Often overlaps with other subgenres like paranormal romance and superhero stories. HARD MODE: Book has an LGBTQ+ POV character.
